org.jdrupes

Interface Channel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Matchable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractComponent, ClassChannel, Handler.NO_CHANNEL, NamedChannel

    public interface Channel
extends Matchable
    Represents a communication bus for sending events between components. Implementations of this interface must make sure that their Matchable.matches(Object) returns true if called with Channel.class as parameter.
    Author:
    mnl
    See Also:
    BROADCAST

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Channel BROADCAST
      A special channel that can be used to send events to all components.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.jdrupes.internal.Matchable

        getMatchKey, matches

    • Field Detail

      • BROADCAST

        static final Channel BROADCAST
        A special channel that can be used to send events to all components.
